title: S2 E11 SSgt Nick Jones - The battle that changed his life forever
description:
SSgt Nick Jones is only the 8th Marine Raider to receive the Navy Cross for valor, an award second only to the Medal of Honor. SSgt Jones take us into the ISIS-occupied tunnels of Northern Iraq and into the battle that changed his life. Leadership in the face of danger, selfless determination, and what it takes to be "Always Faithful, Always Forward"!

Subscribe everywhere you listen to podcasts and don't forget to leave us your review!
itunes:author: US Special Operations Command
